title: Child joins school homework help space
description: Child joins school homework help space
content:
Scenario: Child joins school homework help space
    Given Emma's school has a homework help space on the Elohim network
    And the space is moderated by teachers and parent volunteers
    When Emma joins the space through her school connection
    Then she gains access to homework help from peers and mentors
    And all participants are verified members of the school community
    And the moderation agent maintains supportive atmosphere
    And predatory behavior is structurally impossible
    And Emma can ask questions and help classmates
